events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-03-09 involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
After review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to vehicle collision and damages reported.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure prompt and thorough handling of the auto accident claim.
The claimant was contacted and the auto accident claim was officially acknowledged with initial instructions provided.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license to proceed with the auto accident claim investigation.
Received all requested documentation including accident report, vehicle photos, and claimant’s identification for case processing.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident began, including assessment of fault and damage severity.
Completed investigation confirming the claimant was not at fault and damages align with reported collision details.
A settlement offer was proposed outlining compensation for vehicle repairs and temporary transportation costs.
The claimant expressed appreciation for the efficient processing and transparent communication throughout the claim.
The claim was approved for full settlement based on investigation results and submitted repair estimates.
Payment for vehicle repair costs and agreed compensation was issued to the claimant’s bank account.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation of claim resolution.
The claim documentation was archived securely for future reference and compliance requirements.
